usage: strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and home workouts
key_features: Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
Smooth, anti-slip neoprene finish ensures a comfortable and secure grip
Prevents rolling and provides safe, stable placement on any surface
ai_description: The product consists of vibrant, hexagonal dumbbells with a thick, smooth coating. Images show them in various colors including light blue, turquoise blue, red, green, pink, and purple. One image demonstrates the construction by peeling back the pink coating to reveal a dark metallic core. An infographic highlights features like the vinyl coating, color-coding by weight, and hexagon shape to prevent rolling. A lifestyle shot shows a woman holding a purple dumbbell alongside benefits of exercise. The dumbbells have a matte, non-slip finish and are presented as new condition.
